Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service

Interface SingleTypeSuggestionService<T,S>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of intermediate result returned. Generally, either a String or an EntityDoc
S - the type of collector to collect the results with the remaining count
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAncientSuggestionServiceImpl, AbstractIgnoreMergedListSuggestionServiceImpl, AncientLanguageSuggestionServiceImpl, AncientMeaningSuggestionServiceImpl, FieldBasedMeaningSuggestionServiceImpl, GreekAncientLanguageServiceImpl, GreekAncientMeaningServiceImpl, HebrewAncientLanguageServiceImpl, HebrewAncientMeaningServiceImpl, MeaningSuggestionServiceImpl, ReferenceSuggestionServiceImpl, SubjectSuggestionServiceImpl, TextSuggestionServiceImpl
public interface SingleTypeSuggestionService<T,S>

  • Method Details

    • getExactTerms

      T[] getExactTerms(SuggestionContext context, int max, boolean popularSort)

    • collectNonExactMatches

      T[] collectNonExactMatches(S collector, SuggestionContext context, T[] alreadyRetrieved, int leftToCollect)
      Gets non-exact matches, based on the context, and limited to the total number the collector allows for
      Parameters:
      collector - the collector containing max numbers
      context - the context containing the input from the user, and other information
      alreadyRetrieved - the entities that have already been retrieved
      leftToCollect - the left to collect
      Returns:
      the list of entities

    • convertToSuggestions

      List<? extends PopularSuggestion> convertToSuggestions(T[] docs, T[] extraDocs)
      Converts a number of documents, strings, etc. to their PopularSuggestion equivalents.
      Parameters:
      docs - the array of documents that were retrieved as part of a first call (e.g. exact matches)
      extraDocs - the array of documents that were retrieved as part of the second call (non-exact matches)
      Returns:
      the list of converted suggestions

    • getNewCollector

      S getNewCollector(int leftToCollect, boolean popularSort)
      Creates a 'collector', whose job is to collect entities (e.g. Strings, EntityDoc, etc.) as well as the counts associated with the search, such as the maximum number of hits.)
      Parameters:
      leftToCollect - how many items we really want to collect
      popularSort - the sort which we will use to collect these
      Returns:
      the collector
